snippet: As the Texas House moves closer to impeaching Wallace Hall, a University of Texas System regent, the focus moves closer to what he has dug up about how the system operates.
lead_paragraph: As the Texas House moves closer to impeaching Wallace Hall, a University of Texas System regent, the focus moves closer to what he has dug up about how the system operates.

headline.main: The Thin Line Between a Pest and a Reformer
headline.print_headline: The Thin Line Between a Pest and a Reformer
